items.summary: Fix the Giphy search trigger in `frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDialog.tsx` so that searching runs when the debounced search term changes (replace the incorrect `useState(() => { ... })` side-effect usage with a proper `useEffect` tied to `debouncedSearchTerm`).

Prevent stale or out-of-order Giphy responses from overwriting newer search results in `AvatarPickerDialog` (e.g., ensure only the latest debounced search updates `giphyResults`/`giphyError`, and avoid setting state after the component unmounts).
